insights.title: Insights
insights.runwayLow: Estimated runway below 3 months. Consider reducing outflows or reinforcing cash.
insights.runwayHigh: Comfortable runway (≥ 6 months). You may consider carefully advancing investments.
insights.mtdNegative: Negative result this month. Review the expense mix to attack the largest categories.
insights.mtdPositive: Positive result this month. Track expected receivables to keep the pace.
insights.overduePressure: Overdue payables exceed receivables — short-term cash pressure risk.
insights.overdueReceivables: Relevant overdue receivables. Focus collections on top 10 delays.
insights.mom: Month-over-month change of the month result: {{value}}.
